title: Duo Partner in Silver~ (Bronze and low gold are fine too!)
body: I want someone to play ranked with. My only criteria is a steadfast and resilient person who is nice and not toxic :)). IGN: Foxilite

replies.body:
*Gasp*

It's Fox!

:D

If anyone else is reading this, I can vouch that Fox is an amazing person (or attack helicopter) to play with, and has a great sense of humour :D
Yeah man throw us an add!

Hey bro,
Last season found myself in S4, but unfortunately due to the worst placement and losing streak I’ve ever had - found myself in B2. 

I’m down for a reliable bot lane partner. 

**Name: SSW Jonwayne 
Roles: ADC, SUP, JG**
